title: Engeyo Paartha Mayakkam Lyrics Yaaradi Nee Mohini
stanzas: <div>Engeyo Paartha Mayakkam Lyrics Yaaradi Nee Mohini

can you feel her
is your heart
speaking to her
can you feel the love.yes

Yengeyo paartha mayakkam
eppodho vazhndha nerukkam
dhevathai indha saalai oram
varuvadhu innum
maayam maayam

innum kangal
thirakkaadha sirppam
oru kodi poo
pookkum vetkam

aan manathai azhikka
vandha saabam
arivai mayakkum
maaya thaagam

ivalai partha inbam podhum
vazndhu parkka nenjam yengum

Kanavugalil vazhntha naalai
kan edhire paarkiren
kadhaigalile kaeta pennaa
thirumbi thirumbi paarkiren

angum ingum oadum kaalgal
asaiya maruthu venduthe
indha idathil innum nirkka
idhayam kooda yaengudhe

kavidhai ondru paartha poga
kangal kalangi naanum yenga
mazhaiyin saaral ennai thaakka
vidaigal ellaam kelvi kaetka

Yengeyo paartha mayakkam
eppodho vazhndha nerukkam
dhevathai indha saalai oram
varuvadhu innum
maayam maayam

Aadhi andhamum marandhu
un arugil karaindhu naan ponen
aangal vetka padum tharunam
unnai paarthu naan kandu konden

idi vilundha veettil indru
poochedigal pookkiradhe
ivalthaane undhan paadhi
kadavul bathil ketkiradhe
